A month ago, Julie and Oliver exchanged their first kiss. As the sisters walk up to the brothers, they smile and greet them, “What’s up,” Emily says with a grin.

The boys smile back, noticing the sisters are wearing jeans and t-shirts. While the girls stand there, the boy’s smile back noticing Julies long golden blonde hair and Emily’s long strawberry blonde hair blowing in the morning breeze. “Why aren’t you guys in school?” Julie asks.

Felix responds, “For the same reason you two are not in school, we are ditching today.”

“So what do you guys have planed?” Emily asks smiling.

Felix eagerly shows the sisters the ray gun they just got, but not what they intended to do with it. The sisters not believing the brothers playfully reach out for the gun and try to grab it, but it accidentally fires. The ray gun is set to a short, yet wide firing area, and all four of them quickly miniaturize into their own clothes. Now engulfed by their own clothing, the four shrunken tweens find themselves in a world of darkness. The accident occurred in their front yard, but luckily for them, it was hidden by their mom’s large minivan.

It took a while, less than thirty minutes, but all four of them finally emerged from their dark prisons to find their smooth bare skin warmed by sunlight. They also quickly become aware of how gigantic everything looks around them now, and naturally, they notice they are all naked as the day they were born. This naturally causes them to cover their private parts with their hands. The four tiny kids are looking around for something to wear, but they see a hawk flying high above them. The fear of being eaten makes them all hide underneath the tire of their mom’s minivan.

The four tiny naked kids peek about, and see…
124.title: Things do not go as expected.

choices: Felix grabs the clothes, Oliver grabs Alex, and they return to their room
Jasper arrives and seizes the gun and Alex
Trying to get their hands on Alex, the two younger brothers get shrunk too
Alex escapes his clothes and tries to make a run for it
15.content:
"Let's do it," Oliver said.

Felix grasped the Sizemotron in a firm grip. "Time to show them," he said.

Oliver opened the door to see if the coast looked clear. He ushered Felix out the door, but already has his mind on a new objective. "Can I use it once you've had a chance?"

"Sure." Felix kept his voice to a whisper.

Unexpectedly, the door of Alex's room opened and their oldest sibling stepped into the hall. He look suspiciously at Felix, Ollie, and the toy gun. "That better not have water in it!"

Felix, faced with reality, convulsed and felt his finger twitch and trigger the device. A bright flash of crimson light struck Alex directly in his chest.

As the young man's astonished brothers watched, he slumped into his own clothes, feeling the odd sensation of falling into a chaotic darkness.

From the point of view in the brothers, it almost looked like Alex got sucked into his own clothes, a diminishing head finally dropping through the neck hole of his shirt. His clothes stood for a brief second before collapsing on themselves and sliding down to arrange into an untidy heap on the floor. Their jaws dropped open and their eyes lit up as they saw something small squirming beneath the fabric of Alex's pants.
15.title: Trying It Out at Alex's Expense

info.brief_description: Two boys get tired of their older brothers hazing them.
info.description:
Oliver and Felix Matthews have been teased by their older brothers for being short for years now, and they've finally had enough. With their parents away on vacation, they decide it's the perfect time to exact revenge on them and show them who the real big men in the house are.

The characters:

Oliver (11): Short blond hair, a little bit of baby fat left on him, 5'1". He's generally kind and innocent and looks up to Felix, but even though he's not mean he does wish his brothers would quit making fun of him.
Felix (12): Short brown hair, slim and slightly toned, 5'5. Being the older of the younger brothers he feels compelled to help Oliver when his brothers gang up on him, and is much more interested in revenge out of the two of them.
Jasper (16): Long dirty blond hair, very skinny, 6'. He moves almost silently anywhere he goes, which helps him pull pranks on his little brothers before they even know what happened.
Alex (18): Short dirty blond hair, very fit and toned, 6'3". He's a loud mouth that's always ready with jokes, but very stubborn if he somehow ends up in a losing situation.

There are very few rules to what you can add, but I do ask:
         No descriptive deaths. That includes blood and gore or describing the digestion process or anything of that nature. If someone gets eaten and you want them gone, just go with them never being seen again.
         Try to keep the main characters alive. Side characters are expendable (within the bounds of the rule above) and you can make as many as you want, but keep the main four around.

Other than that, I encourage anyone with an idea to add to the story, just make sure it's coherent and longer than 1000 characters in length. The more descriptive it is, the more everyone will enjoy it.

Thanks to user Ollie Mathews for dreaming up this story.
info.pretty_title: My Little Brothers Got a Shrink Ray
